suppress.notes: Suppression for CVE-2008-0660 (Aurigma ImageUploader/Facebook PhotoUploader ActiveX) Reviewed: 2025-10-13 Reviewer: Security Team Reason: The flagged dependency is Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.Facebook, an official Microsoft OAuth library. It does not use or include any ActiveX controls or vulnerable code described in CVE-2008-0660. This is a false positive due to the package name.

Suppression for Microsoft Test Platform localization resource files Reviewed: 2025-10-13 Reviewer: Security Team Reason: These are localization resource files for the test platform that cause EOFException errors during PE analysis. They don't contain executable code or vulnerabilities.

Suppression for Microsoft Visual Studio Test Platform resource files Reviewed: 2025-10-13 Reviewer: Security Team Reason: These are localization resource files for Visual Studio test platform that cause analysis errors. They are test-only dependencies and don't affect production security.

Suppression for all .NET resource files in test output directories Reviewed: 2025-10-13 Reviewer: Security Team Reason: Resource files contain only localization data and cause PE analyzer errors. They don't contain executable code that could have security vulnerabilities.
